claim: Lonesome Dove is an adaptation of the 1842 short story of the same name.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It is a three-part adaptation of the 1993 novel of the same name by author Larry McMurtry and is the third installment in the Lonesome Dove series serving as a direct sequel to Lonesome Dove  (  1989  )  , ignoring the events of Return to Lonesome Dove  (  1993  )  .

claim: Lonesome Dove is an adaptation of the 1842 short story of the same name.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It is a four-part adaptation of the 1985 novel of the same name by Larry McMurtry and is the first installment in the Lonesome Dove series .
